mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Hon FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 9 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 8 1862. 3.43 pm Order's have been sent today by telegraph to mustering officer to pay bounty. Same bounty applies to men going into old regiments. By order of Secy of War CP. Buckingham Brig Genl & AAG 28B122pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Buckingham, Catharinus P.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
